extendedInfo.description: Introducing Canal's Fleet Risk Manager Application - the quick and easy way for Canal Fleet customers to review the status of their claims.  If you are a fleet insured with Canal Insurance Company, the Fleet Risk Manager Application is a valuable tool for tracking the status of your claim, whether open or closed, and the claims representative assigned to you!As the manager of a large transportation fleet, it can be difficult for you to monitor and mange the status of each claim.  This application makes your job easier and allows you to review and request updates, plus provides you with accurate contact information for the Canal parties involved.We welcome your comments!  Please share your thoughts and ideas for the Canal Fleet Manager Application via the comments feature on the App Store.
